title: Morristown National Historical Park: Education
body: Bring Your Class to Morristown!  Morristown NHP is currently transitioning into a new phase of education. The 21st century education landscape is changing rapidly and the park recognizes the need to address this changing landscape. The park was a pilot case study for a new methodology titled "A Park for Every Classroom and we are ready to formally transition to this model of education programming.Â  Education groups visiting Washington's Headquarters Museum and the Ford Mansion may apply in advance for a Fee Waiver.                 Educational Programs for School Year 2016-2017 Interested in bringing your class to Jockey Hollow to learn about Washington and his troops?  Click here to learn about upcoming opportunities. Read More        Connect to your park! Save a tree and keep up to date easily through your e-mail.  Click here to join our mailing list.
